title: Efficacy of Drug Carolisol in Treating Hypertension
briefSummary: This clinical trial aims to assess the effectiveness and safety of Drug XYZ in reducing blood pressure levels in patients with hypertension.
detailedSummary: The study will involve a double-blind, placebo-controlled trial with a sample size of 500 participants. The participants will be randomly assigned to either the experimental group receiving Drug XYZ or the control group receiving a placebo. The primary outcome measure will be the reduction in systolic and diastolic blood pressure levels after 12 weeks of treatment.
inclusionCriteria: Stable blood pressure medication for at least 4 weeks
Willingness to attend regular follow-up visits
